DOC.detailed_description: This study seek assess impact MenCare+/Bandebereho fathers'/couples ' group education intervention men 's attitude towards , participation , sexual reproductive health , maternal , newborn child health , equitable non-violent relationship child partner . The MenCare+/ Bandebereho program multi-component comprehensive intervention implement Rwanda Men 's Resource Center ( RWAMREC ) Promundo-US , collaboration Rwanda Ministry Health local authority Karongi , Musanze , Nyaruguru Rwamagana district . The propose study evaluate one component program , 15-session group education intervention target young father mother . The impact father ' group education assess randomize control trial design intervention arm men woman participate father group control arm men woman participate intervention . The study collect quantitative qualitative data period approximately three year .
